name: Cloud Escaper 2D
description:
Hello guys!

In this game that I have been working pon for 2 - 3 months, I have made a simple 2D platformer with Unity2D and C#. 

It's not just any platformer, a cloud chasing 2d game!

I am still working on it, more updates like new levels, more effects and boosts/power-ups are still in progress.

Thanks for playing!

(Also, it's free all the time c=)
